verses.roman:
pūrvavat ratha-yātrā kaila daraśana
herā-pañcamī-yātrā dekhe lañā bhakta-gaṇa

synonyms: pūrva-vat—as in the previous year; ratha-yātrā—the car festival; kaila daraśana—saw; herā-pañcamī-yātrā—the festival of Herā-pañcamī; dekhe—He sees; lañā bhakta-gaṇa—with all the devotees.
translation: As in the previous year, the Lord, with all the devotees, saw the Ratha-yātrā festival and the Herā-pañcamī festival as well.
